Text: Wow, people are actually seeding this? You all should know this is extremely shitty. I was extremely disappointed in what I even played. Imagine Leisure Suit Larry, but from the perspective of a female, without the humor. That's what this is. In fact, it's even worse. This game has no substance whatsoever. Also, I don't have to mention this shit is censored.

Hey medianb this is a nice upload.All is well. Downloaded in 23 hrs (slow net connection), Nice Graphics, smooth gameplay........BUT IT'S ALL IN RUSSIAN,WHICH I CANNOT UNDERSTAND.....SO PLEASE CAN YOU UPLOAD AN ENGLISH PATCH OR SOMETHING FOR THE GAME? WILL APPRITIATE IF YOU DO.
